title: My Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website built using React to showcase my skills, projects, and experience. It features a responsive layout, smooth animations, and optimized performance for both desktop and mobile devices.

title: Netflix Clone
description: A responsive Netflix Clone built using HTML and CSS that replicates the core layout and design of Netflixâ€™s homepage. Features a dynamic movie grid, hover animations, and modern UI design inspired by the original platform.

title: Meal Finder App
description: A React-based meal finder application that fetches data from an external API to display meal recipes with images. Includes responsive design, search functionality, and smooth UI interactions for an enhanced user experience.

title: Music Buddy
description: A fully functional web-based music player featuring playlist management, playback controls, and song visualization. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to provide an engaging audio streaming experience with an elegant and intuitive interface.

title: Crypto-Tracker
description: A real-time cryptocurrency price tracking app built with React, Material UI, and Chart.js. Displays live market trends, price charts, and performance analytics with responsive visuals for a modern crypto monitoring experience.

title: HTML Quiz Game
description: An interactive quiz web app created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can answer multiple-choice questions, receive instant feedback, and view their scores in an engaging, responsive, and visually appealing interface.

title: Weather Forecast
description: A weather forecast application built with React JS and OpenWeatherMap API. Displays current weather and a five-day forecast with intuitive visuals, responsive layout, and accurate, real-time data updates for global locations.
